testcase.failure:
Resource: aws_lambda_function.api_handler File: /lambda.tf: 107-130 Guideline: https://docs.prismacloud.io/en/enterprise-edition/policy-reference/aws-policies/aws-general-policies/ensure-that-aws-lambda-function-is-configured-inside-a-vpc-1
107 | resource "aws_lambda_function" "api_handler" { 108 | filename = "lambda_functions/api_handler.zip" 109 | function_name = "${var.project_name}-api-handler-${var.environment}" 110 | role = aws_iam_role.lambda_exec.arn 111 | handler = "index.handler" 112 | runtime = "nodejs18.x" 113 | timeout = 30 114 | memory_size = 512 115 | 116 | layers = [aws_lambda_layer_version.common_dependencies.arn] 117 | 118 | environment { 119 | variables = { 120 | DYNAMODB_USUARIOS_TABLE = aws_dynamodb_table.usuarios.name 121 | DYNAMODB_INFO_TABLE = aws_dynamodb_table.informacion_original.name 122 | EVENT_BUS_NAME = aws_cloudwatch_event_bus.main.name 123 | ENVIRONMENT = var.environment 124 | } 125 | } 126 | 127 | tracing_config { 128 | mode = "Active" 129 | } 130 | }
